casebody.data:
STATE of North Carolina
v.
James Antonio MURCHISON. No. 107P05. Supreme Court of North Carolina. August 18, 2005. Russell J. Hollers, III, Durham, for James A. Murchison. Richard E. Slipsky, Special Deputy Attorney General, Thomas H. Lock, District Attorney, for State of NC.

ORDER

Upon consideration of the petition filed on the 22nd day of February 2005 by Defendant in this matter for discretionary review of the decision of the North Carolina Court of Appeals pursuant to G.S. 7A-31, the following order was entered and is hereby certified to the North Carolina Court of Appeals:

"Denied by order of the Court in conference, this the 18th day of August 2005."
